about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a frontend engineer passionate about building <accent>scalable, modern web applications</accent> that deliver exceptional user experiences. With expertise in Angular and a strong foundation in React and TypeScript, I bring ideas to life with clean, maintainable code.
about.paragraph2: Currently at <company>VERMEG</company>, I lead frontend development for a low-code platform, where I've designed a <accent>reusable component library of 75+ widgets</accent> and mentored junior developers. I'm always exploring new technologies and best practices to level up my craft.
about.paragraph3: When I'm not coding, you'll find me contributing to open-source, exploring AI/ML certifications, or planning my next adventure. I'm open to international relocation and excited about new challenges in dynamic, product-driven teams.
